head.supplied: Copies of Letters Submitted to Mr Gregory for perusal by Colonial Secretary 2d Jan 1857 ¶ Downing Street ¶ 21 Jan 1856. ¶ Sir ¶ ¶ I transmit for your information a copy of a letter from Sir W. Hooker...

div.p: From Henry Labouchere to William Denison
MS Q426 inward correspondence, A. C. Gregory papers, Dixson Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.

Transcribed 23.12.92. To proof.
Copies of Letters Submitted to Mr Gregory for perusal by Colonial Secretary 2d Jan 1857

I transmit for your information a copy of a letter from Sir W. Hooker acknowledging the safe arrival of a Box of plants and seeds sent to him by Dr Mueller the Botanist attached to the North Australian Expedition, and I have to add that a letter dated Victoria River 24th September last with a copy of a Report (addressed to yourself) of the proceedings of the Expedition from the period of its departure from Moreton Bay, has also been received at this Department from Dr Mueller and have been communicated to the Geographical Society
